Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards

Class Deck

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.Deck
public class Deck
extends java.lang.Object
The Deck contains a list of Cards (cardList) that is only used for internal operations and a Deque of Cards (cardDeque) which is used for calls from the outside.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Deck()
    Instantiate a new Deck with no parameters, used for ConcreteProductionCards.
    Deck​(java.lang.String deckType)
    Instantiate a new Deck of the given type, it uses the default paths for the .json files found in /resources/json.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean contains​(Card card)  
    static java.util.List<Deck> createProdDeckList()
    Create the list that contains all the ProductionCard Decks, 12 in total.

    Get the deque of cards inside a deck.
    Card getFirst()
    Get the first card of the chosen deck and remove it.
    Card peekFirst()
    Peek the first card of the chosen deck, without removing it.

  • Constructor Details

    • Deck

      public Deck​(java.lang.String deckType)
      Instantiate a new Deck of the given type, it uses the default paths for the .json files found in /resources/json.
      Parameters:
      deckType - "LeaderCard" for a Leader Deck, "ActionToken" for a Token Deck

    • Deck

      public Deck()
      Instantiate a new Deck with no parameters, used for ConcreteProductionCards.

  • Method Details

    • getCards

      public java.util.Deque<Card> getCards()
      Get the deque of cards inside a deck.
      Returns:
      the deque of cards inside a single deck

    • peekFirst

      public Card peekFirst()
      Peek the first card of the chosen deck, without removing it.
      Returns:
      the first card of the deck, or null if the deck is empty

    • getFirst

      public Card getFirst()
      Get the first card of the chosen deck and remove it.
      Returns:
      the first card of the deck, or null if the deck is empty

    • remove

      public boolean remove​(Card card)

    • contains

      public boolean contains​(Card card)

    • createProdDeckList

      public static java.util.List<Deck> createProdDeckList()
      Create the list that contains all the ProductionCard Decks, 12 in total.
      Returns:
      the list that contains all the small decks

    • size

      public int size()
